page.title: 08SUPERMARKET SURVEY
page.content:
A survey to find out if a supermarket is necessary at Whiddon Valley. We asked the owner of the Forches store. Q.1.Do you approve of the idea? A.1.No. Q.2.Would it take your customers away? A.2.I expect I would lose customers. Q.3.Do you have any comments? A.3.A supermarket is not needed. We asked the public. Q.1.Would you like a store at Whiddon? A.1.24 said yes. 2 said no. Q.2.Would you use it? A.2.19 said yes. Q.3.Will it be cheaper than Forches? A.3.22 thought it would, 3 disagreed. Q.4.Do you have any comments? 1.It would cause nuisance in the area. 2.Small shops needed,chemist,butcher. 3.Need to hurry up with the project.
By Jason Barrow and Sarah Pinn.
